title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 302.10 - Waiver of tuition for foreign students
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 302.10 - Waiver of tuition for foreign students

State Regulations
(a) Notwithstanding any other rule or
regulation pertaining to the charging of tuition in units of the State

University, upon recommendation of the head of the constituent unit of the

University, the Chancellor may admit a limited number of students from foreign
countries without the payment of tuition. (b) At no time shall the number of foreign
students attending the University under tuition waivers exceed one percent of
the total full-time enrollment of the University. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
302.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
